channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Investors want crypto, but not without TradFi backing: Nomura survey
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: A Nomura Laser Digital survey has revealed the majority of institutional investors polled are still keen on crypto.

item.title: Crypto lender Abra has been insolvent since March, says Texas regulator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Abra and its CEO William Barhydt have been issued with an emergency cease and desist order.

item.title: Korean crypto contagion, Bank of China on Ethereum, HK’s exchange red carpet: Asia Express
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Hong Kong lays out welcome mat for exchanges, Korean crypto lender contagion, Do Kwon banged up abroad, Bank of China’s Ethereum debt note.

item.title: BlackRock applies for spot Bitcoin ETF — a US first if approved
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The investment firm joins a long line of applicants; ARK is among those still waiting to hear from the SEC, and Grayscale has appealed its rejection.

item.title: Fed, SEC investigate Goldman Sachs over Silicon Valley Bank’s securities portfolio: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: Both regulatory bodies are inquiring into the activities of Goldman Sachs during its unsuccessful capital raise preceding the downfall of Silicon Valley Bank.

item.title: Sotheby’s auctions off Dmitri Cherniak’s ‘The Goose’ NFT from 3AC collection for $6.2M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Su Zhu and Kyle Davies originally purchased ‘The Goose’ digital artwork in August 2021 for roughly $5.8 million in Ether.

item.title: 3AC liquidators file motion to hold Kyle Davies in contempt
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Civil sanctions against 3AC co-founder Kyle Davies include an award of attorneys’ fees and a $10,000 daily fine until he is in compliance with a subpoena.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Judge will consider whether to try Sam Bankman-Fried separately for superseding charges: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Prosecutors said they were prepared to try SBF on his original eight-count indictment starting in October, with the remaining five charges to be decided by Judge Lewis Kaplan.

item.title: EU regulator will launch MiCA consultation starting in July
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The MiCA framework suggested a roughly 18-month timeline to fully take effect, with regulators and lawmakers seeming to go through proposals aimed at ensuring a smooth implementation.

item.title: Do Kwon heading into extradition custody in Montenegro after receiving bail: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The Terra Labs co-founder will be held for up to six months while the Montenegrin court considers South Korea’s extradition request.

item.title: Curve’s (CRV) price hits a 1-year low amid looming liquidation threat
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: A risky loan in AAVE and the resulting liquidation threat for CRV have pushed the governance token to a one-year low, but there is a chance for a powerful short squeeze.

item.title: Hinman documents in Ripple case raise questions about SEC’s motives
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: According to crypto lawyer Fred Rispoli, the Hinman documents depict an agency prioritizing expanding its jurisdiction over fulfilling its core responsibility of safeguarding U.S. investors.

item.title: Ripple partners with Colombia’s central bank to explore blockchain technology
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The pilot program will run through 2023 with the intent of demonstrating blockchain utility to the general public.

item.title: Buying Bitcoin is preferable to BTC mining in most circumstances — Analysis
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: Data suggests that investors are better off buying spot Bitcoin than attempting to mine it unless the market is in a mega bull run.

item.title: Dubai’s VARA approves OKX ‘preparatory’ license as part of exchange’s expansion plans
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The Middle Eastern arm of the exchange said it had opened an office in the Dubai World Trade Center and planned to increase its staff to 30 people.

item.title: Ripple verdict could spark a new bull market — Or more malaise
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Hamilton Keats
item.description: SEC v. Ripple is a landmark legal battle that is going to shape how courts treat cryptocurrencies — and a ruling is due soon.

item.title: Bittrex withdrawals set to resume after bankruptcy court gives green light
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The court left the issue of the subordinacy of government claims open; Bittrex received multimillion-dollar credits from FinCEN and OFAC.

item.title: Coinbase redeems $65M in convertible notes at 29% discount
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The cryptocurrency exchange estimates it will only need $45.5 million in cash to redeem the instruments.

item.title: 3 Bitcoin price metrics showing ‘insane’ similarities to 2020 breakout
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin remains bullish — and arguably more so than ever — depending on what BTC price metrics are used to assess it.

item.title: New York bans CoinEx exchange, seizes $1.7M in crypto assets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: CoinEx was shut down for failing to register as a broker-dealer and for “falsely representing itself as a crypto exchange," the NYAG said.

item.title: DeFi options platform uses social logins, margin trading to draw in liquidity
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Developers claim Synquote handled one single trade of over $1 million of notional volume with no detectable slippage in its beta period.

item.title: Is blockchain technology ready for high-storage applications?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Anthony Clarke
item.description: What does the blockchain space need to enable the development of high-storage apps?

item.title: Sweat Economy DAO votes to repurpose $10M of idle tokens
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: The move-to-earn platform had 2 billion SWEAT tokens locked up in inactive user accounts that the community has voted to return to a governance contract.

item.title: Opinion: GOP crypto maxis almost as bad as Dems’ ‘anti-crypto army’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alex O'Donnell
item.description: Fighting between GOP crypto maxis and anti-crypto Dems fails to appreciate blockchain’s importance to the U.S.’ long-term economic interests.

item.title: Here’s how hackers are using mining pools as mixers: Chainalysis
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A wallet linked to ransomware attacks funneled funds through a mining pool to make it seem like the digital assets were earned through mining.

item.title: A PR expert’s tips for memecoin projects
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Motti Peer
item.description: The difference between winging it and hiring professionals is the difference between Pepecoin and others that never make a dent.

item.title: Celsius seeks to convert alts to Bitcoin and Ether under reorganization plan
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The crypto lender has proposed converting all its altcoin holdings into Bitcoin and Ethereum to quell growing regulatory concerns and maximize the value of its assets.

item.title: Why is Ethereum (ETH) price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: Ethereum price is down today as traders assess the Federal Reserve's hawkish stance for the remainder of 2023.

item.title: How blockchain technology makes it easier for Africans to upskill
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elisha Owusu Akyaw
item.description: The narrative that blockchain technology could revolutionize how people interact with technology in Africa may not be stale after all.
